abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission has begun an inquiry into whether two senior executives at Dow Chemical secretly tried to put the company into play and into the unusual trading in its stock that may have resulted, according to The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission has begun an inquiry into whether two senior executives at Dow Chemical secretly tried to put the company into play and into the unusual trading in its stock that may have resulted, according to The New York Times.

headline.main: Dow Faces S.E.C. Inquiry Into Deal Talks and Trades
